name: Lemon Pastry Cream
author: Brittney Tun
summary: Easy lemon custard pastry cream for lemon tartlets.
directions: Whisk together 1 cup heavy cream, egg yolks, and cornstarch in a bowl
Combine remaining 2 cups heavy cream, sugar, and lemon juice in a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan over medium heat
Bring to a gentle boil; boil until mixture begins to thicken, about 10 minutes
Add egg yolk mixture slowly, whisking constantly until it thickens, about 5 minutes
Mixture will break; pour into a glass bowl
Press a piece of plastic wrap directly on the surface of the mixture to prevent skin forming
Let cool completely at room temperature
Pour cooled mixture into a mixing bowl
Beat at medium speed with an electric mixer fitted with a wire whip until thick and creamy
